Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Plate
Description: Large plate with a round base and a rim more than 1 cm thick, with a white slip on some areas on the outer rim, which protrudes over the exterior (wider in some sections than other). Made from a buff-coloured clay with an organic temper, the vessel is very well preserved.
